page.shortlink: api client api a5 u object each method

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object or array to iterate over.

argument.name: function
argument.description: The function to call with the data from each item.

page.returns: result (array) - An array that the passed in function can dynamically add to.
page.description: Iterate over each entry in an array of object, and all entries in child arrays or object, and call a function for each item.
